DOC.brief_summary: The aim study determine whether combine intraoral injection non steroidal anti-inflammatory drug ( Ketorolac ) , association conventional inferior alveolar nerve block , would improve success rate teeth irreversible pulpitis . Forty adult volunteer include criterion randomly divide two group ( n=20 ) . All patient receive standard inferior alveolar nerve block injection . After achieve lip numbness , one group receive buccal infiltration Ketorolac one receive buccal infiltration Normal Saline placebo . Any pain root canal treatment record use analog visual scale . The success consider none mild pain treatment . The data analyze use Mann-U-Whitney chi-squared test .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Ketorolac Buccal Infiltration Success Rate Inferior Alveolar Nerve Block
DOC.detailed_description: Objectives : The aim study determine whether combine intraoral injection non steroidal anti-inflammatory drug ( Ketorolac ) , association conventional inferior alveolar nerve block , would improve success rate teeth irreversible pulpitis . Design : Randomized double blind clinical trial Setting conduct : Forty adult volunteer randomly divide two group ( n=20 ) . All patient receive standard inferior alveolar nerve block injection 4 % Articaine 1:100000 epinephrine supplemental buccal infiltration 0.9 mL 4 % Articaine 1:100000 epinephrine . After five minute lip numbness achieve , one group receive supplemental buccal infiltration 30 mg/mL Ketorolac Tromethamine group receive buccal infiltration normal saline . Endodontic access preparation initiate 15 minute initial IANB two negative response electric pulp test . Pain caries dentin removal , access cavity preparation canal length measurement record use visual analog scale ( VAS ) . The success consider none mild pain treatment . The data analyze use Mann-U-Whitney chi-squared test . Participants include major eligibility criterion : patient symptomatic irreversible pulpitis ( Heft Parker VAS ≥54 ) mandibular molar tooth without systemic disease ; non smoking ; without medicine consumption analgesic sedation Intervention : Ketorolac infiltration Main outcome measure : Pain caries dentin removal , access cavity preparation canal length measurement use VAS .
DOC.criteria: patient age range 1865 ; without systemic disease ; without medicine consumption ; non smoking ; non pregnant ; non breast feeding ; symptomatic irreversible pulpitis ( Visual Analog Scale ≥ 54 ) one mandibular molar need root canal treatment
